fixed_skill.desc: 21.5/22.6/23.7% chance to inflict Enrage on all foes for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Wage War

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 154.5/162.2/170.0% of Attack.
innate_skill.name: Deadly Fury

innate_skill.desc: 32.6/34.2/35.9% chance to inflict Dizzy on 1 foe for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Dazzler

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 25.4%. After inflicting a debuff, increase user's Attack by 17% and critical rate by 4.5% for 2 turns. If the debuff is a spiritual ailment, increase ailment accuracy by 35% more.
passive_skill.name: Shadow Contract

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 25.4%. After inflicting a debuff, increase user's Attack by 19% and critical rate by 5% for 2 turns. If the debuff is a spiritual ailment, increase ailment accuracy by 35% more.
passive_skill.name: Shadow Contract I

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 25.4%. After inflicting a debuff, increase user's Attack by 21% and critical rate by 5.5% for 2 turns. If the debuff is a spiritual ailment, increase ailment accuracy by 35% more.
passive_skill.name: Shadow Contract II

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 25.4%. After inflicting a debuff, increase user's Attack by 23% and critical rate by 6% for 2 turns. If the debuff is a spiritual ailment, increase ailment accuracy by 35% more.
passive_skill.name: Shadow Contract III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
